snippet: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday’s selections include the latest effort — or perhaps gimmick — by Uber to attract users. Plus, a product manager at Google tells the story of how the Glass...
abstract: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday’s selections include the latest effort — or perhaps gimmick — by Uber to attract users. Plus, a product manager at Google tells the story of how the Glass command came to be.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Riding an Uber Boat and the Origin of 'O.K., Glass'
